item.description:
A band transcending the boundaries of style and able to adapt to virtually any performance situation, The Cartells have built a reputation for being the band of choice for concerts, nightclubs, & private functions of all kinds, and is one of the most popular bands in Connecticut.

Whether it's a wedding, corporate party or concert, The Cartells have

been the favorite choice of people who want the best music, and the best time!

Jazz, swing, motown, R&B, rock and roll, popular music of all styles are equally represented in their impressive repertoire, and their dedication to defining and fulfilling the wants & needs of their audience results in every appearance being an event to remember.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: THe Cartells @ Donahue's
